basics.name: Muhammad Zahid Naeem
basics.label: Research Scientist
basics.Bio: I am Experienced in multidisciplinary research with proficiency in Development economics, financial economics with focus on financial crises.

work.name: University of the Punjab, Lahore
highlights:
Delivered graduate and postgraduate courses in management and social sciences.
 Focused on inclusive teaching methods during the lectures.
 Supervised thesis and research projects, guiding students on contemporary issues in management and business strategies.
 Conducted interdisciplinary research, publishing findings in peer-reviewed journals and presenting at international
conferences.
 Engaged in curriculum development, ensuring course content aligned with industry standards and accreditation requirements.
 Actively participated in departmental committees to enhance academic policies, student engagement, and program quality.
 Collaborated with industry partners to create internship and placement opportunities for students, bridging academia and practice.
 Organised workshops and seminars on leadership, innovation, and business trends to enrich student learning experiences.
 Mentored junior faculty members, contributing to their professional development and teaching effectiveness.
